website_summaries.verdict: These flexible, slender boar bristles brush butter and egg wash onto pastry with ease and superior flow control.
pros: Made of double-boiled, bleached, and sterilized premium boar bristles
Great for high fluid retention and fine pastry washes
Choice of shape and size brush
Better control of flow than silicone brush
cons: Hairs can fall out into food

customer_reviews.title: It's REALLY big
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but this thing is massive! Way bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Marie

customer_reviews.title: Probably not boar hair
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and shape of this brush, and the bristles seem to be properly secured. However, the "boar bristles" melted upon use.
customer_reviews.author: AllieCat88

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Good brush not only to use for cooking, but great for cleaning keyboard, small spaces in car, etc. Buy two - - you will be glad you did. As a suggestion, handle could be a bit shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper-N-VA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. Tired of buying cheap items in the grocery store so thought I'd give this a try. It works great, cleans up easily and is very well made. Will be back to buy other brushes!
customer_reviews.author: NMGal

customer_reviews.title: Love the round shape!
customer_reviews.text: I had a flat pastry brush that I was using to grease my Bundt pans and muffin tins, but the shape made this difficult. I purchased this brush and love the round shape, it’s so much easier to get into those small crevices. The flat brushes just clang against the sides and are difficult to get into some areas. This is the best brush I’ve ever used for basting and for pastry.
customer_reviews.author: TheMOM!

customer_reviews.title: I use mine for cleaning a coffee grinder
customer_reviews.text: If you have a coffee grinder with steel burrs, you know that using a dry brush for cleaning is important for keeping the burrs rust-free - even a quick brush-out once a month keeps stale grounds from imparting their flavors onto new beans. Detail brushes like this one are perfect, and this was the best-made one that I've found. Zero hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: but it's perfect. It would also be great for its actual ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my coffee grinder. I worried that the bristles might not be stiff enough for that purpose, but it's perfect. It would also be great for its actual intended purpose as a pastry brush. I think I wouldn't use it as a basting brush because liquid could get stuck in the ferrule. It's sturdy and the handle is wooden, a plus.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: NOTE THE SIZE. It's big. It works great, though, for buttering pans or whatever, not really for pastries.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: Not made in USA
customer_reviews.text: The product looks almost same like the one showed on the the website, but the brand name and where it is made are different than what I expect. The one I received has SPARTA on it instead of Carlisle and it is made in Mexico, not US made.
customer_reviews.author: Ruru

customer_reviews.title: Great for fancy bakeware!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pastry brush! Works great for coating my fancy baking pans that have a lot of nooks and crannies!!! Cakes come out looking perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Charzy

customer_reviews.title: This is nicely made
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a bar b que brush for some time to replace an old one. This is nicely made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, non shedding
customer_reviews.text: Little use, but hopefully bristles will not start to shed
customer_reviews.author: jenny w

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pastry Brush!
customer_reviews.text: It's a big brush - but works great and is well made. The bristles don't melt like my other brush so that's a wonderful thing!
customer_reviews.author: Breezycake

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Brush
customer_reviews.text: Appreciate the quality of this product. Prefer the natural bristles and wood handle to plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Serena

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, I have a smaller round brush and use ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice,I have a smaller round brush and use it a lot and know this brush will get put to good use.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: classy - natural bristles and wood handle - like it better than the artificial or plastic stuff
customer_reviews.author: condobolin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I wanted for my application, but seems to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: David Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: The best brush ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this type of brush over silicone. And it's very sturdy. I'm purchasing more of these for sure
customer_reviews.author: S. Zachery

customer_reviews.title: Amazon comes through again with a good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: We had a Pampered Chef basting brush that lasted quite a few years but we needed a new one. We found that the Pampered Chef brush was hard to clean. Very happy with this new brush.
customer_reviews.author: Michele L. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: The best basting brush by far
customer_reviews.text: The best basting brush by far. The handle is long enough to baste a turkey in the oven but not too long for easy handling on the countertop. The one inch round holds more and spreads better than a 1 inch flat.
customer_reviews.author: asquared2

customer_reviews.title: This brush is awesome!! the quality is great and I'm sure ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush is awesome!!the quality is great and I'm sure I will have it for years! The handle fits great in my hand. I love love love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zdravko Belic

customer_reviews.title: Round Pastery brush
customer_reviews.text: Works Great ! I would recommend this product to use for egg wash easily spreads on my dough .
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Brush up
customer_reviews.text: Very well made brush, better than anything you can get at Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Shankbone

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Silicone
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves these types of brushes, and we can't find them anywhere. This is his new favorite. He finally threw the other one away!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked fine in the beginning , but in very few weeks the hair starts to come off !!
customer_reviews.author: dody

customer_reviews.title: Used for raviolis
customer_reviews.text: The size of this brush is perfect for putting egg wash in smaller areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jill D

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure it’s not boar bristles since some of them ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure it’s not boar bristles since some of them melted when I oiled a hot pan with it
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Great brush. Hasn't frayed at all or dropped any ...
customer_reviews.text: Great brush. Hasn't frayed at all or dropped any hairs (yet). Using it mostly for doing egg washes so far and it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: J F

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning coffee grinder
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cleaning my burr coffee grinder. Works great for that, bristles stay intact. You'd think this wouldn't be a needed review, but most other products have negative reviews for this use case!
customer_reviews.author: Straker H. Carryer

customer_reviews.title: Good but too big
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the measurements. At 12" long and a brush almost 2" wide once washed, it is too big to use with my baked items. This would be appropriate for meats when using BBSauce. Good quality but much too big for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: D Chandler

product_meta.title: Carlisle 4038000-E Sparta Round Basting/Pastry Brush with Boar Bristles, 1"
product_meta.description: This Carlisle 4038000 round Sparta brush is 12" in length and has water-resistant boar bristles for basting meats and poultry. The handle is made of lacquered hardwood for durability, with a nylon ferrule for resistance to abrasion and cracking. The bristles are epoxy-set in the ferrule for durability and to prevent collection of bacteria in air pockets. The bristles on this Sparta brush are made of double-boiled, bleached, and sterilized boar hair bristles, which can withstand temperatures up to 500 degrees Carlisle manufactures food service equipment and supplies and sanitary maintenance tools and supplies for commercial, industrial, and institutional facilities. The company, founded in 1954, is headquartered in Oklahoma City, OK.
